snippet.title: Dangerous game of wait and see
snippet.content: THE North Korea attitude towards every other country, particularly those fairly close by but certainly including Australia, has been made crystal clear by their use of trialling the range etc. of their ICBM missiles. They have proven they can hit Australia with nuclear weapons without any advance warning. So what should we do? Wait and see? Or ensure that somehow or other their ruler is made to either just go or at least change his attitude? GEOFF CASS Tewantin This is how early you need to be at the airport now. Family face life in limbo EVERY mum wants to see their child live a long, happy life Architect of a region stops briefly on his final journey. Maleny open day throws spotlight on theatre groups The popular comedian brings her latest show to the Sunshine Coast The Voice winner Judah Kelly announces national tour. I guess everything was impressive as I grew up in Eudlo. OUR family was part of the first wave of sea changers. A place for lovers of good food and wine to gather WE were the first building to open in Sunshine Plaza. GREAT venues and great people. MEMORIES of Surfair, Thommo's and Stewart's. The house featured on TV series Grand Designs Australia in 2014 What your money will get you in the Beef Cap v the capital city: Prime block lays dormant for decade in Coast town Rental vacancies disappear as Coast heads for boom
